name: Turn Based Prototype
description:
The protoype of a learning and passion project, taking inspiration from wonderful turn-based strategy games such as Advance Wars, Wargroove, Final Fantasy Tactics and Fire Emblem

Recruit from a variety of units to dominate the battlefield and control key structures. Weave together or dance around the various weather effects created by your and your opponent's units while they duke it out.

Current Features
- Dynamic battlefield through localized weather and hazards, created by the units themselves- 2 maps
- 4 unique units
- Up to 4 players duking it out in a free-for-all
